summary: Cleans up and converts Sinderion's Lab into a lore-friendly player home.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][b][color=red]Sinderion's Field Laboratory Redone[/color][/b][/heading]

Sinderion's Lab is a great home for Dwemer explorer characters or scholars but it has a few problems. One, there is no safe storage and features minimal crafting stations. Two, it is quite the mess and doesn't fit the look of what a grand researcher Sinderion was (hey, it may have been a few years since he died, but that was no excuse!) So, after a fellow Nexus user, Daventry, messaged me a request to clean it up, I did just that.

The Laboratory now features the following:
* Almost all crafting supplies - Alchemy, enchanting, cooking and smithing
* Unique storage containers and several safe chests
* Cluttery goodness! New models courtesy of Insanity, Blary and Oarisstys.
* Double-bed with well-rested bonus
* Nav-Meshed (BUT I wouldn't recommend taking a follower in there still)
* Fus-Ro-Dah proof!
* A bookcase
* Several weapon plaques for all your display needs
* Unique containers! A scroll collection, food basket and alchemy container
~~ And more! ~~

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Installation[/b]=====[/color]

Download and drop the file into your data folder. Place meshes and textures into the appropiatly named folders.
Or just use the NMM.
To uninstall, just remove the file. Make sure to get your belongings out first though!

[color=darkorange]====[b]Compatibility[/b]====[/color]

[i]Compatible:[/i]
Should be fine to use with the Necromancer start in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/?] Alternate Start - Live Another Life[/url] or any other mods similar to this.

[i]Incompatible:[/i]
Any other mods that edit Sinderion's Lab.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]
This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.
Credit to Insanity for his multiple resources.
Credit to Oarisstys for the use of the Mod Resources Pack.
Credit to Blary for the use of the Moth in Cage Resource, Open Book, Food Container Resource and Wall Art Resource.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
